description: Try our easy to follow Charred Asparagus With Prosciutto & Balsamic Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ vegetables,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Asparagus,Peanut free
name: Charred Asparagus With Prosciutto & Balsamic Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add prosciutto and walnut. Cook for 5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a bowl.
Melt butter in pan. Add vinegar and cook for 3 minutes or until mixture comes to the boil and thickens slightly. Remove from heat.

Preheat a barbecue grill on medium. Spray asparagus with oil. Cook for 3 minutes, turning, until charred on all sides. Transfer to a platter. Drizzle balsamic glaze over asparagus and sprinkle with prosciutto mixture. Serve.
